name: NewMe NuMe LuMe: Alien Wars
description:
1. Story of the Game
Kim Ttolttol, a young girl in her twenties and currently a college student, spends her days lazing around at home due to the recent college break.

As she crosses the street like any other day, she suddenly finds herself in a blank space amidst the sound of a truck horn.

In front of the bewildered Kim Ttolttol, two gods appear, offering to send her home if she helps them...



2. Gameplay

NewMe NuMe LuMe: Alien Wars is a 2D top-down action game where stages are cleared using movement, sliding, shooting, and melee attacks.

The stages are structured with at least one boss and mid-boss, currently consisting of six stages.




There are 11 weapon items in the stages to aid Kim Ttolttol's battles, which can be acquired and used to defeat enemies.



Enhance health, movement speed, shooting, and melee attacks with money dropped when defeating enemies after clearing each stage, making subsequent gameplay smoother.




Each stage features 6 to 10 different types of diverse enemies. Help Kim Ttolttol return home amidst their attacks!
